pages.text: The rite of the $(marked)Golden Flock$() is used to actively convert $(marked)Villagers$() into $(ml:bestiary/serfs)Yellow Serfs$().$(br2)You must be initiated into the ways of $(ml:goo/hastur)the Yellow King$() to cast this.
The converted Villager must be under the effect of $(marked)mania$(), best achieved with the $(ml:rites/hysteria)Hysteria$() rite.
